batchTask.name: job_dwd_ord_trd_d
batchTask.sqlText:
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dwd_ord_trd_d (
orderId             STRING          COMMENT '订单ID'
,tenantId           STRING          COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId             STRING          COMMENT '门店ID'
,customerId         STRING          COMMENT '顾客ID'
,memberId           STRING          COMMENT '会员ID'
,orderTime	        STRING	        COMMENT '下单时间'
,paymentTime	      STRING	        COMMENT '结账时间'
,deliverType	      BIGINT	        COMMENT '就餐类型(1:内用;2:外送;3:自提;4:外带;)'
,sourceChild	      BIGINT	        COMMENT '订单子来源(1:ANDROID收银终端;2:IPAD自助终端;3:IPAD收银终端;31:微信官微;32:微信商微;33:微信快捷支付;41:百度外卖;51:百度直达号;61:百度糯米点菜;71:百度地图;81:呼叫中心;91:必胜客自助;92:味千;111:商户官网;131:loyal;141:OnMobile客如云;142:OnMobile os;151:熟客;161:饿了吗;171:点评正餐;181:美团外卖;191:安卓自助;)'
,tradeNo            STRING          COMMENT '订单编号，门店下唯一'
,tradePayStatus	    BIGINT	        COMMENT '支付状态(1:未支付;2:支付中;3:已支付;4:退款中;5:已退款;6:退款失败;7:预支付;8:等待退款;9:支付失败;)'
,tradeType          STRING          COMMENT '交易类型 1:SELL:售货 2:REFUND:退货 3:SPLIT:拆单 4:反结账(已收款退货时新生成的订单) 5:反结账退货(已收款退货时新生成的反向订单,金额是销货单的负数)'
,tradeStatus	      BIGINT	        COMMENT '订单状态(1:未处理;2:挂单;3:已确认;4:已完成(全部支付);5:已退货;6:已作废;7:已拒绝;8:已取消;10:已反结账;)'
-- ,payModelId	      BIGINT	        COMMENT '支付方式: -1:会员卡余额,-2:优惠券,-3:现金,-4:银行卡,-5:微信支付,-6:支付宝,-7:百度钱包,-8:百度直达号,-9:积分抵现,-10:百度地图,-11:银联刷卡,-12:百糯到店付,13:百度外卖,-14:饿了么,-15:实体卡支付,-16:大众点评,-17:美团外卖,-18:点评团购券,-19:点评闪惠,-20:临时卡余额,-21:糯米点菜,-22:第三方C端,-23:美团闪惠,-24:美团团购卷,-25:钱包生活,-26:百度糯米团购券,-27:乐富支付'
-- ,paySource	        BIGINT	        COMMENT '支付来源，1：Cashier 2：Kiosk 3：百度外卖 4：百度糯米 5： 百度地图 6： Loyal（短信储值） 7：OnMobile 8：快捷支付 9：熟客 10：portal 11:饿了么 12:大众点评 13：loyal后台 14：美团外卖 15:微信'
,thirdServiceCharge	DOUBLE 	        COMMENT '服务费'
,thirdSubsidies	    DOUBLE       	  COMMENT '补贴'
,shopActualAmount   DOUBLE          COMMENT '商户实收金额'
,tradeAmount        DOUBLE          COMMENT '订单原始金额'
,custActualPay      DOUBLE          COMMENT '顾客实付金额'
,custShouldPay	    DOUBLE	        COMMENT '顾客应付金额'
,dishTotalAmount	  DOUBLE	        COMMENT '商品总额'
,extraAmount	      DOUBLE	        COMMENT '附加金额'
,privilegeAmount	  DOUBLE          COMMENT '优惠金额'
,molinAmount	      DOUBLE      	  COMMENT '抹零金额'
,overFlowAmt	      DOUBLE	        COMMENT '四舍五入'
,tradeOverFlow	    DOUBLE      	  COMMENT '溢收金额'
) COMMENT '日订单交易信息明细表'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 100;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dwd_ord_trd_d PARTITION(ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT DISTINCT
  coalesce(t2.orderId, t1.orderid)                       AS orderid,
  coalesce(t2.tenantId, t1.tenantId)                     AS tenantId,
  coalesce(t2.shopId, t1.shopId)                         AS shopId,
  coalesce(t2.customerId, t1.customerId)                 AS customerId,
  coalesce(t2.memberId, t1.memberId)                     AS memberId,
  coalesce(t2.orderTime, t1.orderTime)                   AS orderTime,
  coalesce(t2.paymentTime, t1.paymentTime)               AS paymentTime,
  coalesce(t2.deliverType, t1.deliverType)               AS deliverType,
  coalesce(t2.sourceChild, t1.sourceChild)               AS sourceChild,
  coalesce(t2.tradeNo, t1.tradeNo)                       AS tradeNo,
  coalesce(t2.tradePayStatus, t1.tradePayStatus)         AS tradePayStatus,
  coalesce(t2.tradeType, t1.tradeType)                   AS tradeType,
  coalesce(t2.tradeStatus, t1.tradeStatus)               AS tradeStatus,
  coalesce(t2.thirdServiceCharge, t1.thirdServiceCharge) AS thirdServiceCharge,
  coalesce(t2.thirdSubsidies, t1.thirdSubsidies)         AS thirdSubsidies,
  coalesce(t2.shopActualAmount, t1.shopActualAmount)     AS shopActualAmount,
  coalesce(t2.tradeAmount, t1.tradeAmount)               AS tradeAmount,
  coalesce(t2.custActualPay, t1.custActualPay)           AS custActualPay,
  coalesce(t2.custShouldPay, t1.custShouldPay)           AS custShouldPay,
  coalesce(t2.dishTotalAmount, t1.dishTotalAmount)       AS dishTotalAmount,
  coalesce(t2.extraAmount, t1.extraAmount)               AS extraAmount,
  coalesce(t2.privilegeAmount, t1.privilegeAmount)       AS privilegesTotal,
  coalesce(t2.molinAmount, t1.molinAmount)               AS molinAmount,
  coalesce(t2.overFlowAmt, t1.overFlowAmt)               AS overFlowAmt,
  coalesce(t2.tradeOverFlow, t1.tradeOverFlow)           AS tradeOverFlow
FROM
  (SELECT
     orderId,
     tenantId,
     shopId,
     customerId,
     memberId,
     orderTime,
     paymentTime,
     deliverType,
     sourceChild,
     tradeNo,
     tradePayStatus,
     tradeType,
     tradeStatus,
     thirdServiceCharge,
     thirdSubsidies,
     shopActualAmount,
     tradeAmount,
     custActualPay,
     custShouldPay,
     dishTotalAmount,
     extraAmount,
     privilegeAmount,
     molinAmount,
     overFlowAmt,
     tradeOverFlow
   FROM dwd_ord_trd_d WHERE ds = '${key_2d}') t1 FULL OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
     o.id                 AS orderId,
     o.tenantId           AS tenantId,
     shop.id              AS shopId,
     oc.customerId        AS customerId,
     oc.memberId          AS memberId,
     o.orderTime          AS orderTime,
     o.paymentTime        AS paymentTime,
     o.deliverType        AS deliverType,
     o.sourceChild        AS sourceChild,
     o.tradeNo            AS tradeNo,
     o.tradePayStatus     AS tradePayStatus,
     o.tradeType          AS tradeType,
     o.tradeStatus        AS tradeStatus,
     o.thirdServiceCharge AS thirdServiceCharge,
     o.thirdSubsidies     AS thirdSubsidies,
     o.receivedAmount     AS shopActualAmount,
     o.tradeAmount        AS tradeAmount,
     o.custActualPay      AS custActualPay,
     o.custShouldPay      AS custShouldPay,
     o.dishTotalAmount    AS dishTotalAmount,
     o.extrachargeTotal   AS extraAmount,
     o.privilegesTotal    AS privilegeAmount,
     o.molinAmount        AS molinAmount,
     o.overFlowAmt        AS overFlowAmt,
     o.tradeOverFlow      AS tradeOverFlow
   FROM ods_nrs_sync_keruyun_order o
     LEFT OUTER JOIN ods_nrs_sync_keruyun_order_customer oc ON o.id = oc.orderId AND oc.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN ods_nrs_tenant_shop shop
       ON o.tenantId = shop.tenantId AND o.shopId = shop.keruyun_shop_id AND shop.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
   WHERE o.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') t2
    ON t1.tenantId = t2.tenantId AND t1.shopId = t2.shopId AND t1.orderId = t2.orderId AND t1.tradeNo = t2.tradeNo AND
       t1.customerId = t2.customerId;

batchTask.name: job_dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_d
batchTask.sqlText:
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_1d(
statDate            STRING      COMMENT '统计日期'
,tenantId           STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId             STRING      COMMENT '门店ID'
,customerId         STRING      COMMENT '顾客ID'
,max_payment_time   STRING      COMMENT '最近一天最晚支付时间'
,inter_days_1d      BIGINT      COMMENT '最近一天顾客最后一次发生支付行为距离当前日期多少天'
,pay_quantity_1d    BIGINT      COMMENT '最近一天顾客支付行为次数'
,pay_amount_1d      DOUBLE      COMMENT '最近一天顾客支付总金额'
,tot_days_1d        BIGINT      COMMENT '最近一天顾客出现支付行为的天数之和'
) COMMENT '最近1天算法信息指标'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING ) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;

set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;
set hive.exec.dynamic.partition.mode=nonstrict;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_1d PARTITION(ds)
SELECT
  date_add(concat(substr(t.par, 0, 4), '-', substr(t.par, 5, 2), '-', substr(t.par, 7, 2)),1)        AS statDate,
  t.tenantId              AS tenantId,
  t.shopId                AS shopId,
  t.customerId            AS customerId,
  t.paymentTime           AS max_payment_time,
  datediff(date_add(concat(substr(t.par, 0, 4), '-', substr(t.par, 5, 2), '-', substr(t.par, 7, 2)),1),
           t.paymentTime) AS inter_days_1d,
  t.pay_quantity_1d       AS pay_quantity_1d,
  t.pay_amount_1d         AS pay_amount_1d,
  t.tot_days_1d           AS tot_days_1d,
  t.par                   AS ds
FROM (
       SELECT
         tenantId,
         min(shopId)                                                              AS shopId,
         customerId,
         max(paymentTime)                                                         AS paymentTime,
         COUNT(1)                                                                 AS pay_quantity_1d,
         sum(custActualPay)                                                       AS pay_amount_1d,
         size(collect_set(substr(regexp_replace(paymentTime, '-', ''), 1, 8)))    AS tot_days_1d,
         date_format(paymentTime, 'yyyyMMdd')                                     AS par
       FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
       WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AND tradePayStatus = 3 AND isnotnull(customerId)
       GROUP BY tenantId, customerId, date_format(paymentTime, 'yyyyMMdd')) t;

SELECT
  date_add(concat(
               substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 0, 4), '-', substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 5, 2), '-',
               substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 7, 2)), 1) AS statDate,
  tenantId,
  min(shopId)                                             AS shopId,
  customerId,
  datediff(date_add(concat(substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 0, 4), '-', substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 5, 2), '-',

,label                  BIGINT      COMMENT '顾客未来七天内是否消费：1-是，0-否 (距离今日不足七天算最近区间)'
) COMMENT '当日顾客未来七天内是否消费标记'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING ) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;

  d.shopId,

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS ads_alg_pay_cust_info (
statDate                STRING      COMMENT '统计日期'
,tenantId               STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId                 STRING      COMMENT '门店ID'
,customerId             STRING      COMMENT '顾客ID'
,sex                    STRING      COMMENT '顾客性别'
,age                    BIGINT      COMMENT '顾客年龄'
,level                  BIGINT      COMMENT '顾客等级'
,inter_days_1d          BIGINT      COMMENT '最近一天顾客最后一次发生支付行为距离当前日期多少天'
,pay_quantity_1d        BIGINT      COMMENT '最近一天顾客支付行为次数'
,pay_amount_1d          DOUBLE      COMMENT '最近一天顾客支付总金额'
,tot_days_1d            BIGINT      COMMENT '最近一天顾客出现支付行为的天数之和'
,inter_days_3d          BIGINT      COMMENT '最近3天顾客最后一次发生支付行为距离当前日期多少天'
,pay_quantity_3d        BIGINT      COMMENT '最近3天顾客支付行为次数'
,pay_amount_3d          DOUBLE      COMMENT '最近3天顾客支付总金额'
,tot_days_3d            BIGINT      COMMENT '最近3天顾客出现支付行为的天数之和'
,inter_days_7d          BIGINT      COMMENT '最近7天顾客最后一次发生支付行为距离当前日期多少天'
,pay_quantity_7d        BIGINT      COMMENT '最近7天顾客支付行为次数'
,pay_amount_7d          DOUBLE      COMMENT '最近7天顾客支付总金额'
,tot_days_7d            BIGINT      COMMENT '最近7天顾客出现支付行为的天数之和'
,inter_days_15d         BIGINT      COMMENT '最近15天顾客最后一次发生支付行为距离当前日期多少天'
,pay_quantity_15d       BIGINT      COMMENT '最近15天顾客支付行为次数'
,pay_amount_15d         DOUBLE      COMMENT '最近15天顾客支付总金额'
,tot_days_15d           BIGINT      COMMENT '最近15天顾客出现支付行为的天数之和'
,inter_days_30d         BIGINT      COMMENT '最近30天顾客最后一次发生支付行为距离当前日期多少天'
,pay_quantity_30d       BIGINT      COMMENT '最近30天顾客支付行为次数'
,pay_amount_30d         DOUBLE      COMMENT '最近30天顾客支付总金额'
,tot_days_30d           BIGINT      COMMENT '最近30天顾客出现支付行为的天数之和'
,inter_days_std         BIGINT      COMMENT '历史至今顾客最后一次发生支付行为距离当前日期多少天'
,pay_quantity_std       BIGINT      COMMENT '历史至今顾客支付行为次数'
,pay_amount_std         DOUBLE      COMMENT '历史至今顾客支付总金额'
,tot_days_std           BIGINT      COMMENT '历史至今顾客出现支付行为的天数之和'
,label                  BIGINT      COMMENT '未来七天购买情况label'
) COMMENT '算法信息指汇总表'
PARTITIONED  BY (ds STRING ) LIFECYCLE 365;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;
 

-------- 前一天 ---------
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE  ads_alg_pay_cust_info PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  date_add(concat(
               substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 0, 4), '-', substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 5, 2), '-',
               substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 7, 2)), 1) AS statDate,
  cust.tenantId,
  cust.shopId,
  cust.id                                                 AS customerId,
  cust.sex,
  cust.age,
  cust.level,
  coalesce(rmf_1.inter_days_1d, 0)                        AS inter_days_1d,
  coalesce(rmf_1.pay_quantity_1d, 0)                      AS pay_quantity_1d,
  coalesce(rmf_1.pay_amount_1d, 0)                        AS pay_amount_1d,
  coalesce(rmf_1.tot_days_1d, 0)                          AS tot_days_1d,
  coalesce(rmf_3.inter_days_3d, 0)                        AS inter_days_3d,
  coalesce(rmf_3.pay_quantity_3d, 0)                      AS pay_quantity_3d,
  coalesce(rmf_3.pay_amount_3d, 0)                        AS pay_amount_3d,
  coalesce(rmf_3.tot_days_3d, 0)                          AS tot_days_3d,
  coalesce(rmf_7.inter_days_7d, 0)                        AS inter_days_7d,
  coalesce(rmf_7.pay_quantity_7d, 0)                      AS pay_quantity_7d,
  coalesce(rmf_7.pay_amount_7d, 0)                        AS pay_amount_7d,
  coalesce(rmf_7.tot_days_7d, 0)                          AS tot_days_7d,
  coalesce(rmf_15.inter_days_15d, 0)                      AS inter_days_15d,
  coalesce(rmf_15.pay_quantity_15d, 0)                    AS pay_quantity_15d,
  coalesce(rmf_15.pay_amount_15d, 0)                      AS pay_amount_15d,
  coalesce(rmf_15.tot_days_15d, 0)                        AS tot_days_15d,
  coalesce(rmf_30.inter_days_30d, 0)                      AS inter_days_30d,
  coalesce(rmf_30.pay_quantity_30d, 0)                    AS pay_quantity_30d,
  coalesce(rmf_30.pay_amount_30d, 0)                      AS pay_amount_30d,
  coalesce(rmf_30.tot_days_30d, 0)                        AS tot_days_30d,
  coalesce(rmf_st.inter_days_std, 0)                      AS inter_days_std,
  coalesce(rmf_st.pay_quantity_std, 0)                    AS pay_quantity_std,
  coalesce(rmf_st.pay_amount_std, 0)                      AS pay_amount_std,
  coalesce(rmf_st.tot_days_std, 0)                        AS tot_days_std,
  coalesce(lab.label, 0)                                  AS tot_days_std
FROM (SELECT
        tenantId,
        min(shopId) AS shopId,
        id,
        max(sex)    AS sex,
        max(age)    AS age,
        max(level)  AS level
      FROM dim_cust_info
      WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
      GROUP BY tenantId, id
     ) cust
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
     tenantId,
     customerId,
     inter_days_1d   AS inter_days_1d,
     pay_quantity_1d AS pay_quantity_1d,
     pay_amount_1d   AS pay_amount_1d,
     tot_days_1d     AS tot_days_1d
   FROM dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_1d
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' -- AND statDate = date_sub(current_date(),1 )
  ) rmf_1 ON cust.tenantId = rmf_1.tenantId AND cust.id = rmf_1.customerId
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
     tenantId,
     customerId,
     inter_days_3d   AS inter_days_3d,
     pay_quantity_3d AS pay_quantity_3d,
     pay_amount_3d   AS pay_amount_3d,
     tot_days_3d     AS tot_days_3d
   FROM dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_3d
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' -- AND statDate = date_sub(current_date(),1)
  ) rmf_3 ON cust.tenantId = rmf_3.tenantId AND cust.id = rmf_3.customerId
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
     tenantId,
     customerId,
     inter_days_7d   AS inter_days_7d,
     pay_quantity_7d AS pay_quantity_7d,
     pay_amount_7d   AS pay_amount_7d,
     tot_days_7d     AS tot_days_7d
   FROM dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_7d
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' -- AND statDate = date_sub(current_date(),1 )
  ) rmf_7 ON cust.tenantId = rmf_7.tenantId AND cust.id = rmf_7.customerId
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
     tenantId,
     customerId,
     inter_days_15d   AS inter_days_15d,
     pay_quantity_15d AS pay_quantity_15d,
     pay_amount_15d   AS pay_amount_15d,
     tot_days_15d     AS tot_days_15d
   FROM dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_15d
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' -- AND statDate = date_sub(current_date(),1 )
  ) rmf_15 ON cust.tenantId = rmf_15.tenantId AND cust.id = rmf_15.customerId
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
     tenantId,
     customerId,
     inter_days_30d   AS inter_days_30d,
     pay_quantity_30d AS pay_quantity_30d,
     pay_amount_30d   AS pay_amount_30d,
     tot_days_30d     AS tot_days_30d
   FROM dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_30d
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' -- AND statDate = date_sub(current_date(),1 )
  ) rmf_30 ON cust.tenantId = rmf_30.tenantId AND cust.id = rmf_30.customerId
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
     tenantId,
     customerId,
     inter_days_std   AS inter_days_std,
     pay_quantity_std AS pay_quantity_std,
     pay_amount_std   AS pay_amount_std,
     tot_days_std     AS tot_days_std
   FROM dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_std
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' -- AND statDate = date_sub(current_date(),1 )
  ) rmf_st ON cust.tenantId = rmf_st.tenantId AND cust.id = rmf_st.customerId
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  (SELECT
     tenantId,
     customerId,
     label
   FROM dws_alg_cust_label
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
  ) lab ON cust.tenantId = lab.tenantId AND cust.id = lab.customerId;




-------- 前二天 ---------
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE  ads_alg_pay_cust_info PARTITION (ds = '${key_2d}')
SELECT
  date_add(concat(
               substr('${key_2d}', 0, 4), '-', substr('${key_2d}', 5, 2), '-',

  coalesce(rmf_7.pay_amount_7d, 0)                        AS pay_amount_7d,

  coalesce(rmf_30.inter_days_30d, 0)                      AS inter_days_30d,
  coalesce(rmf_30.pay_quantity_30d, 0)                    AS pay_quantity_30d,
  coalesce(rmf_30.pay_amount_30d, 0)                      AS pay_amount_30d,
  coalesce(rmf_30.tot_days_30d, 0)                        AS tot_days_30d,
  coalesce(rmf_st.inter_days_std, 0)                      AS inter_days_std,

#coding=utf-8
import math
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import random
import datetime as dt
from sklearn.preprocessing import MinMaxScaler, LabelEncoder, StandardScaler
from sklearn.cluster import KMeans
from pyhdfs import HdfsClient
import re
import pymysql
from sqlalchemy import Column, String, create_engine
from sqlalchemy.orm import sessionmaker
from sqlalchemy.ext.declarative import declarative_base

class Activity_loyalty():

    def __init__(self, hosts,user_name,filepath,date,shop_id=None,tenantid=None):

        self.hdfsdate = None
        self.host = hosts
        self.user_name = user_name
        self.filepath = filepath
        self.date = dt.datetime.strftime(date,'%Y%m%d')
        self.activity = None
        self.loyalty = None
        self.membership = None
        self.shop_id = shop_id
        self.tenantid = tenantid

    def get_all_hdfs_date(self):

        client = HdfsClient(hosts=self.host, user_name=self.user_name)
        listdir = client.listdir(self.filepath+'ds={}'.format(self.date))
        col = ['statdate','tenantid','shop_id','customerid','sex','age','level',
                'inter_days_1d','pay_quantity_1d','pay_amount_1d','tot_days_1d',
                'inter_days_3d','pay_quantity_3d','pay_amount_3d','tot_days_3d',
                'inter_days_7d','pay_quantity_7d','pay_amount_7d','tot_days_7d',
                'inter_days_15d','pay_quantity_15d','pay_amount_15d','tot_days_15d',
                'inter_days_30d','pay_quantity_30d','pay_amount_30d','tot_days_30d',
                'inter_days_std','pay_quantity_std','pay_amount_std','tot_days_std','label']
        dfset = []
        for t_listdir in listdir:
            t_file = self.filepath+'ds={}'.format(self.date) +'/' + t_listdir
            inputfile = client.open(t_file)
            df = pd.read_table(inputfile, encoding='utf-8',sep='\x01',header=None)
            df.columns = col
            dfset.append(df)

        df = pd.concat(dfset)
        col_exchange = {
                'customer_id': 'customer_id', 'statdate': 'start_time', 'sex': 'sex', 'age': 'age','label':'is_buy',
                 'level': 'level', 'inter_days_1d': 'R_1', 'pay_quantity_1d': 'F_1', 'pay_amount_1d': 'M_1', 
                 'tot_days_1d': 'days_1', 'inter_days_3d': 'R_3', 'pay_quantity_3d': 'F_3', 'pay_amount_3d': 'M_3', 
                 'tot_days_3d': 'days_3', 'inter_days_7d': 'R_7', 'pay_quantity_7d': 'F_7', 'pay_amount_7d': 'M_7',
                  'tot_days_7d': 'days_7', 'inter_days_15d': 'R_15', 'pay_quantity_15d': 'F_15', 'pay_amount_15d': 'M_15',
                  'tot_days_15d': 'days_15', 'inter_days_30d': 'R_30', 'pay_quantity_30d': 'F_30', 'pay_amount_30d': 'M_30',
                   'tot_days_30d': 'days_30', 'inter_days_std': 'R', 'pay_quantity_std': 'F', 'pay_amount_std': 'M'
                   }
        df.rename(columns=col_exchange,inplace=True)
        # df.drop('tenantid',axis=1,inplace=True)
        df['M'] = df['M']*100

        df['R'] = (df['R'] - 58.81747899159664) / 44.89101608046954
        df['M'] = (df['M'] - 14333.808403361345) / 25596.820331727085
        df['F'] = (df['F'] - 4.1549579831932775) / 6.830617289912884

        self.tenantid = list(df['tenantid'])[0]
        self.shop_id = list(df['shop_id'])[0]
        self.hdfsdate = df[['R','F','M']]

    
    def get_activity_class(self,xi,yi):
        activity = [[4.516837481698389, -1.153674832962138],
                     [0.856515373352855, -0.997772828507795],
                     [-0.16837481698389464, -0.5746102449888641],
                     [-0.314787701317716, 1.1403118040089089]]
        distance = []
        for i in activity:
            distance.append(((xi - i[0])**2 + (yi-i[1])**2)**0.5)
        return np.argmin(distance)

     
    def get_loyalty_class(self,xi,yi):
        lolayty = [[4.516837481698389, 5.30011891471072],
                   [2.320644216691069, 1.3933836755665567],
                   [0.856515373352855, 0.4166998657805158],
                   [-0.314787701317716, -0.3255798296568752]]
        distance = []
        for i in lolayty:
            distance.append(((xi - i[0])**2 + (yi-i[1])**2)**0.5)
        return np.argmin(distance)

    def get_activity(self):

        df = self.hdfsdate[['R','F']]
        df = df.reset_index().drop('index',axis=1)
        for i in df.index:
            df.loc[i,'activity_class'] = self.get_activity_class(df.loc[i,'F'],df.loc[i,'R'])
        tmp = df.groupby('activity_class')[['activity_class']].agg('count')
        tmp.columns = ['rate']
        tmp = tmp.reset_index()
        tmp['rate'] = tmp['rate'] / sum(tmp['rate'])
        # tmp['rate'] = round(tmp['rate'],2)
        tmp = tmp.set_index('activity_class')
        self.activity = tmp.reset_index()
        self.activity.rename(columns={'rate':'percent'},inplace=True)
        self.activity['people'] = list(map(int,self.activity['percent']*len(self.hdfsdate)))
        self.activity['percent'] = self.activity['percent']*100
        self.activity['stat_date'] = self.date
        # self.activity['shop_id'] = self.shop_id
        self.activity['tenant_id'] = self.tenantid
        self.activity['dim'] = self.activity['activity_class'].replace({0:6,1:7,2:8,3:9})
        self.activity =  self.activity.drop('activity_class',axis=1)
        
 
    def get_loyalty(self):

        df = self.hdfsdate[['M','F']]
        df = df.reset_index().drop('index',axis=1)
        for i in df.index:
            df.loc[i,'loyalty_class'] = self.get_loyalty_class(df.loc[i,'F'],df.loc[i,'M'])
        tmp = df.groupby('loyalty_class')[['loyalty_class']].agg('count')
        tmp.columns = ['rate']
        tmp = tmp.reset_index()
        tmp['rate'] = tmp['rate'] / sum(tmp['rate']) * 100
        # tmp['rate'] = round(tmp['rate'],2)
        tmp = tmp.set_index('loyalty_class')
        self.loyalty = tmp.reset_index()
        self.loyalty.rename(columns={'rate':'percent'},inplace=True)
        self.loyalty['stat_date'] = self.date
        # self.loyalty['shop_id'] = self.shop_id
        self.loyalty['tenant_id'] = self.tenantid
        self.loyalty['dim'] = self.loyalty['loyalty_class'].replace({0:49,1:48,2:47,3:46})
        self.loyalty =  self.loyalty.drop('loyalty_class',axis=1)

    def get_membership(self):
        df = self.hdfsdate[['R','F','M']]
        df['R'] = df['R'] * 44.89101608046954 + 58.81747899159664
        df['M'] = df['M'] * 25596.820331727085 + 14333.808403361345
        df['F'] = df['F'] * 6.830617289912884 + 4.1549579831932775

        df['membership_class'] = -1
        df.loc[df['R']>108,'membership_class'] = 4
        df.loc[(df['F']<=2)&(df['membership_class']==-1),'membership_class'] = 0
        df.loc[(df['F']<=18)&(df['membership_class']==-1),'membership_class'] = 1
        df.loc[(df['R']<=13)&(df['membership_class']==-1),'membership_class'] = 2
        df.loc[df['membership_class']==-1,'membership_class'] = 3
        tmp = df.groupby('membership_class')[['membership_class']].agg('count')
        tmp.columns = ['rate']
        tmp = tmp.reset_index()
        tmp['rate'] = tmp['rate'] / sum(tmp['rate'])
        # tmp['rate'] = round(tmp['rate'],2)
        tmp = tmp.set_index('membership_class')
        self.membership = tmp.reset_index()
        self.membership.rename(columns={'rate':'percent'},inplace=True)
        self.membership['people'] = list(map(int,self.membership['percent']*len(self.hdfsdate)))
        self.membership['percent'] = self.membership['percent']*100
        self.membership['stat_date'] = self.date
        # self.membership['shop_id'] = self.shop_id
        self.membership['tenant_id'] = self.tenantid
        self.membership['dim'] = self.membership['membership_class'].replace({0:1,
            1:2,2:3,3:4,4:5})
        self.membership =  self.membership.drop('membership_class',axis=1)
    
    def activity_to_mysql(self):
        print('activity_to_mysql...###############################################################')
        host='172.16.20.6'
        port = 3306
        user = 'nrs_zhiquan'
        password = 'dtstack2018'
        database = 'nrs_zhiquan'
        conn = create_engine('mysql+pymysql://{}:{}@{}:3306/{}?charset=utf8'.format(user,password,host,database))
        pd.io.sql.to_sql(self.activity,"nrs_mp_daily_activity_stat",conn,
                         if_exists='append',index=False)

    def membership_to_mysql(self):
        print('membership_to_mysql...###############################################################')
        host='172.16.20.6'
        port = 3306
        user = 'nrs_zhiquan'
        password = 'dtstack2018'
        database = 'nrs_zhiquan'
        conn = create_engine('mysql+pymysql://{}:{}@{}:3306/{}?charset=utf8'.format(user,password,host,database))
        pd.io.sql.to_sql(self.membership,"nrs_mp_daily_stage_stat",conn,
                         if_exists='append',index=False)
    

    def loyalty_to_mysql(self):
        print('loyalty_to_mysql...###############################################################')
        host='172.16.20.6'
        port = 3306
        user = 'nrs_zhiquan'
        password = 'dtstack2018'
        database = 'nrs_zhiquan'
        conn = create_engine('mysql+pymysql://{}:{}@{}:3306/{}?charset=utf8'.format(user,password,host,database))
        pd.io.sql.to_sql(self.loyalty,"nrs_mp_daily_loyalty_stat",conn,
                         if_exists='append',index=False)


if __name__=='__main__':

    filepath = '/user/hive/warehouse/intel_card_dev.db/ads_alg_pay_cust_info/'
    hosts = '172.16.20.5:50070,172.16.20.6:50070'
    user_name= 'admin'
    date = dt.datetime.now()
    activity_loyalty = Activity_loyalty(hosts=hosts,user_name=user_name,filepath=filepath,date=date)
    activity_loyalty.get_all_hdfs_date()
    activity_loyalty.get_activity()
    activity_loyalty.get_loyalty()
    activity_loyalty.get_membership()
    activity_loyalty.activity_to_mysql()
    activity_loyalty.loyalty_to_mysql()
    activity_loyalty.membership_to_mysql()

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dws_coupon_trd_1d(
statDate            STRING    COMMENT '交易日期'
,tenantId           STRING    COMMENT '租户ID'
,service_order_id   STRING    COMMENT '发券活动ID'
,gmv                DOUBLE    COMMENT '当日总营业额'
,coupon_gmv         DOUBLE    COMMENT '当日核销产生营业额'
,tc                 BIGINT    COMMENT '当日交易笔数'
,pct                DOUBLE    COMMENT '当日客单价'
,trade_user_count   DOUBLE    COMMENT '当日交易人数'
,coupon_used        BIGINT    COMMENT '当日核销优惠券数量'
,total_coupon_count STRING    COMMENT '当日优惠券总面额'
,order_gmv          DOUBLE    COMMENT '当日订单总额'
) COMMENT '发券后运营指标统计'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 1000;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;
set hive.exec.dynamic.partition.mode=nonstrict;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_coupon_trd_1d PARTITION(ds)
SELECT
    total.paymentTime                                                      AS statDate, 
    total.tenantId,
    total.service_order_id                                                 AS service_order_id,
    sum(total.shopActualAmount)                                            AS gmv,
    coalesce(sum(CASE
               WHEN total.coupon_instance_id IS NOT NULL
                 THEN total.shopActualAmount
               END),0)                                                     AS coupon_gmv,
    count(total.orderId)                                                   AS tc,
    avg(total.shopActualAmount)                                            AS pct,
    count(total.orderId)                                                   AS trade_user_count,
    coalesce(sum(CASE
               WHEN total.coupon_instance_id IS NOT NULL
                 THEN 1
               END),0)                                                     AS coupon_used,
    coalesce(sum(CASE
               WHEN total.coupon_instance_id IS NOT NULL
                 THEN total.deno_value
               END),0)                                                     AS total_coupon_count,
    sum(tradeAmount)                                                       AS tradeAmount,
    total.paymentTime                                                      AS ds
FROM (
SELECT 
    d.orderId                                AS orderId,
    d.tenantId,
    d.shopId,
    d.customerId,
    date_format(d.paymentTime,'yyyyMMdd')    AS paymentTime,
    d.shopActualAmount,
    d.tradeAmount,
    d.custActualPay,
    d.custShouldPay,
    d.dishTotalAmount,
    d.extraAmount,
    d.privilegeAmount,
    ins.id                                   AS coupon_instance_id,
    ins.service_order_id                     AS service_order_id,
    ins.couponType,
    ins.deno_value,
    ins.full_value
FROM 
(SELECT 
    orderId,
    tenantId,
    shopId,
    customerId,
    paymentTime,
    tradeNo,
    shopActualAmount,
    tradeAmount,
    custActualPay,
    custShouldPay,
    dishTotalAmount,
    extraAmount,
    privilegeAmount
 FROM dwd_ord_trd_d WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' and tradeStatus=4) d 
LEFT OUTER JOIN  
(SELECT 
    id,
    tenantId,
    shopId,
    service_order_id,
    customerId,
    checkTime,
    couponType,
    send_date,
    tradeNo,
    deno_value,
    full_value
 FROM dwd_coupon_instance_d WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AND isnotnull(tradeNo) AND couponStatus = 2) ins 
 ON d.tenantId = ins.tenantId AND d.tradeNo=ins.tradeNo) total  -- 去掉shopId的关联，因为instance的shopId不准确
GROUP BY total.tenantId, total.service_order_id, total.paymentTime;

set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dws_coupon_trd_stat_new_nouse(
tenantId            STRING    COMMENT '租户ID'
,service_order_id   STRING    COMMENT '发券活动ID'
,gmv                DOUBLE    COMMENT '总营业额'
,coupon_gmv         DOUBLE    COMMENT '核销产生营业额'
,tc                 BIGINT    COMMENT '交易笔数'
,avg_tc             DOUBLE    COMMENT '平均交易笔数'
,pct                DOUBLE    COMMENT '客单价'
,trade_user_count   DOUBLE    COMMENT '交易人数'
,coupon_used        BIGINT    COMMENT '核销优惠券数量'
,total_coupon_count STRING    COMMENT '优惠券总面额'
,order_gmv          DOUBLE    COMMENT '订单总额'
,period             BIGINT    COMMENT '发券周期（单位：天）'
) COMMENT '发券周期内的未使用优惠券的交易情况'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING ) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_coupon_trd_stat_new_nouse PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  d.tenantid,
  cou.id                          AS service_order_id,
  sum(gmv)                        AS gmv,
  sum(coupon_gmv)                 AS coupon_gmv,
  sum(tc)                         AS tc,
  avg(tc)                         AS avg_tc,
  coalesce(sum(gmv) / sum(tc), 0) AS pct,
  sum(trade_user_count)           AS trade_user_count,
  sum(coupon_used)                AS coupon_used,
  sum(total_coupon_count)         AS total_coupon_count,
  sum(order_gmv)                  AS order_gmv,
  first(cou.period)               AS period
FROM
  (SELECT
     statdate,
     tenantid,
     gmv,
     coupon_gmv,
     tc,
     trade_user_count,
     coupon_used,
     total_coupon_count,
     order_gmv
   FROM dws_coupon_trd_1d WHERE isnull(service_order_id)) d
  LEFT OUTER JOIN dim_coupon_order_info cou
    ON d.tenantid = cou.tenantId AND cou.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
WHERE d.statdate >= date_format(cou.start_time, 'yyyyMMdd') AND
      d.statdate <= date_format(date_add(cou.start_time, cou.period + 7), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY d.tenantid,cou.id;



--------- ----------- -----------


CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dws_coupon_trd_stat_new_use(
tenantId            STRING    COMMENT '租户ID'
,service_order_id   STRING    COMMENT '发券活动ID'
,gmv                DOUBLE    COMMENT '总营业额'
,coupon_gmv         DOUBLE    COMMENT '核销产生营业额'
,tc                 BIGINT    COMMENT '交易笔数'
,avg_tc             DOUBLE    COMMENT '平均交易笔数'
,pct                DOUBLE    COMMENT '客单价'
,trade_user_count   DOUBLE    COMMENT '交易人数'
,coupon_used        BIGINT    COMMENT '核销优惠券数量'
,total_coupon_count STRING    COMMENT '优惠券总面额'
,order_gmv          DOUBLE    COMMENT '订单总额'
,period             BIGINT    COMMENT '发券周期（单位：天）'
) COMMENT '发券周期内的使用优惠券的交易情况'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING ) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_coupon_trd_stat_new_use PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  d.tenantid,
  d.service_order_id              AS service_order_id,
  sum(gmv)                        AS gmv,
  sum(coupon_gmv)                 AS coupon_gmv,
  sum(tc)                         AS tc,
  avg(tc)                         AS avg_tc,
  coalesce(sum(gmv) / sum(tc), 0) AS pct,
  sum(trade_user_count)           AS trade_user_count,
  sum(coupon_used)                AS coupon_used,
  sum(total_coupon_count)         AS total_coupon_count,
  sum(order_gmv)                  AS order_gmv,
  first(cou.period)               AS period
FROM
  (SELECT
     statdate,
     tenantid,
     service_order_id,
     gmv,
     coupon_gmv,
     tc,
     trade_user_count,
     coupon_used,
     total_coupon_count,
     order_gmv
   FROM dws_coupon_trd_1d WHERE isnotnull(service_order_id)) d
  LEFT OUTER JOIN dim_coupon_order_info cou
    ON d.tenantid = cou.tenantId AND d.service_order_id = cou.id AND cou.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
WHERE d.statdate >= date_format(cou.start_time, 'yyyyMMdd') AND
      d.statdate <= date_format(date_add(cou.start_time, cou.period + 7), 'yyyyMMdd')
GROUP BY d.tenantid,d.service_order_id;

batchTask.sqlText:
set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;
-- set hive.exec.dynamic.partition.mode=nonstrict;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_old(
  tenantId         STRING COMMENT '租户ID',
  service_order_id STRING COMMENT '发券活动ID',
  old_avg_tc       DOUBLE COMMENT '历史平均交易数',
  old_pct          DOUBLE COMMENT '历史客单价',
  old_apr          DOUBLE COMMENT '历史连带率',
  old_roi          DOUBLE COMMENT '历史回报率'
) COMMENT '智能发券前历史记录表' 
PARTITIONED BY(ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_old PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  coalesce(trd.tenantId, dish.tenantId)                                                   AS tenantId,
  coalesce(trd.service_order_id, dish.service_order_id)                                   AS service_order_id,
  coalesce(trd.avg_tc, 0)                                                                 AS old_avg_tc,
  coalesce(trd.pct, 0)                                                                    AS old_pct,
  coalesce(coalesce(dish.sales, 0) / coalesce(trd.tc, 0), 0)                              AS old_apr,
  coalesce(coalesce(trd.gmv, 0) / (coalesce(trd.order_gmv, 0) - coalesce(trd.gmv, 0)), 0) AS old_roi
FROM
  (SELECT
     tenantId,
     service_order_id,
     gmv,
     coupon_gmv,
     tc,
     avg_tc,
     pct,
     order_gmv
   FROM dws_coupon_trd_stat_old_nouse
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') trd
  FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                     tenantId,
                     service_order_id,
                     sales
                   FROM dws_coupon_dish_stat_old_nouse
                   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') dish
    ON trd.tenantId = dish.tenantId AND trd.service_order_id = dish.service_order_id;


-- ###############    ############### --


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_new(
  tenantId         STRING COMMENT '租户ID',
  service_order_id STRING COMMENT '发券活动ID',
  gmv              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内总营业额',
  coupon_gmv       DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内核券营业额',
  avg_tc           DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内平均交易数',
  pct              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内客单价',
  apr              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内连带率',
  coupon_dist      BIGINT COMMENT '总发券量',
  coupon_acpt      BIGINT COMMENT '券总领取量',
  coupon_used      BIGINT COMMENT '核销量',
  roi              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内回报率'
) COMMENT '智能发券周期内记录表' 
PARTITIONED BY(ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_new PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  coalesce(trd.tenantId, dish.tenantId, send.tenantId)                           AS tenantId,
  coalesce(trd.service_order_id, dish.service_order_id, send.service_order_id)   AS service_order_id,
  coalesce(trd.gmv, 0)                                                           AS gmv,
  coalesce(trd.coupon_gmv, 0)                                                    AS coupon_gmv,
  coalesce(trd.tc, 0) / coalesce(trd.period + 7, 0)                              AS avg_tc,
  coalesce(trd.pct, 0)                                                           AS pct,
  coalesce(coalesce(dish.sales, 0) / coalesce(trd.tc, 0), 0)                     AS apr,
  coalesce(send.coupon_dist, 0)                                                  AS coupon_dist,
  coalesce(send.coupon_acpt, 0)                                                  AS coupon_acpt,
  coalesce(trd.coupon_used, 0)                                                   AS coupon_used,
  coalesce(coalesce(trd.coupon_gmv, 0) / coalesce(trd.total_coupon_count, 0), 0) AS roi
FROM
  (SELECT
     coalesce(nouse.tenantId, used.tenantId)                                      AS tenantId,
     coalesce(nouse.service_order_id, used.service_order_id)                      AS service_order_id,
     coalesce(nouse.gmv, 0) + coalesce(used.gmv, 0)                               AS gmv,
     coalesce(nouse.coupon_gmv, 0) + coalesce(used.coupon_gmv, 0)                 AS coupon_gmv,
     coalesce(nouse.tc, 0) + coalesce(used.tc, 0)                                 AS tc,
     coalesce(
         (coalesce(nouse.gmv, 0) + coalesce(used.gmv, 0)) /
         (coalesce(nouse.tc, 0) + coalesce(used.tc, 0)),
         0)
                                                                                  AS pct,
     coalesce(nouse.trade_user_count, 0) + coalesce(used.trade_user_count, 0)     AS trade_user_count,
     coalesce(nouse.coupon_used, 0) + coalesce(used.coupon_used, 0)               AS coupon_used,
     coalesce(nouse.total_coupon_count, 0) + coalesce(used.total_coupon_count, 0) AS total_coupon_count,
     coalesce(nouse.order_gmv, 0) + coalesce(used.order_gmv, 0)                   AS order_gmv,
     coalesce(nouse.period, used.period)                                          AS period 
   FROM (SELECT
           tenantId,
           service_order_id,
           gmv,
           coupon_gmv,
           tc,
           pct,
           trade_user_count,
           coupon_used,
           total_coupon_count,
           order_gmv,
           period
         FROM dws_coupon_trd_stat_new_nouse
         WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') nouse FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                                                                      tenantId,
                                                                      service_order_id,
                                                                      gmv,
                                                                      coupon_gmv,
                                                                      tc,
                                                                      pct,
                                                                      trade_user_count,
                                                                      coupon_used,
                                                                      total_coupon_count,
                                                                      order_gmv,
                                                                      period
                                                                    FROM dws_coupon_trd_stat_new_use
                                                                    WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') used
       ON nouse.tenantId = used.tenantId AND nouse.service_order_id = used.service_order_id) trd
  FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                     coalesce(nouse.tenantId, used.tenantId)                 AS tenantId,
                     coalesce(nouse.service_order_id, used.service_order_id) AS service_order_id,
                     coalesce(nouse.sales, 0) + coalesce(used.sales, 0)      AS sales
                   FROM (SELECT
                           tenantId,
                           service_order_id,
                           sales
                         FROM dws_coupon_dish_stat_new_nouse
                         WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') nouse FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                                                                                      tenantId,
                                                                                      service_order_id,
                                                                                      sales
                                                                                    FROM dws_coupon_dish_stat_new_use
                                                                                    WHERE
                                                                                      ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') used
                       ON nouse.tenantId = used.tenantId AND nouse.service_order_id = used.service_order_id) dish
    ON trd.tenantId = dish.tenantId AND trd.service_order_id = dish.service_order_id
  FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                     service_order_id,
                     tenantId,
                     sum(coupon_dist)   AS coupon_dist,
                     sum(coupon_acpt)   AS coupon_acpt 
                   FROM dws_coupon_send_1d
                   WHERE ds <= '${bdp.system.bizdate}' GROUP BY tenantId,service_order_id) send
    ON trd.tenantId = send.tenantId AND trd.service_order_id = send.service_order_id;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ads_nrs_coupon_statistic(
  id               STRING COMMENT '主键ID',
  tenantId         STRING COMMENT '租户ID',
  service_order_id STRING COMMENT '发券活动ID',
  gmv              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内总营业额',
  coupon_gmv       DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内核券营业额',
  avg_tc           DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内平均交易数',
  old_avg_tc       DOUBLE COMMENT '历史平均交易数',
  pct              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内客单价',
  old_pct          DOUBLE COMMENT '历史客单价',
  apr              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内连带率',
  old_apr          DOUBLE COMMENT '历史连带率',
  coupon_dist      BIGINT COMMENT '总发券量',
  coupon_acpt      BIGINT COMMENT '券总领取量',
  coupon_used      BIGINT COMMENT '核销量',
  roi              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内回报率',
  old_roi          DOUBLE COMMENT '历史回报率',
  gmt_created      STRING COMMENT '插入时间',
  gmt_modified     STRING COMMENT '更新时间'
)COMMENT '总的智能发券表' 
PARTITIONED BY(ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_coupon_statistic PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  concat(old.tenantId, '0000', old.service_order_id, '000') AS id,
  old.tenantId,
  old.service_order_id,
  new.gmv,
  new.coupon_gmv,
  new.avg_tc,
  old.old_avg_tc,
  new.pct,
  old.old_pct,
  new.apr,
  old.old_apr,
  new.coupon_dist,
  new.coupon_acpt,
  new.coupon_used,
  new.roi,
  old.old_roi,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}'                                             AS gmt_created,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}'                                             AS gmt_modified
FROM ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_old old INNER JOIN ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_new new
    ON old.tenantId = new.tenantId AND old.service_order_id = new.service_order_id AND new.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
WHERE old.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}';

  tenantId         STRING COMMENT '租户ID',
  service_order_id STRING COMMENT '发券活动ID',
  old_avg_tc       DOUBLE COMMENT '历史平均交易数',
  old_pct          DOUBLE COMMENT '历史客单价',
  old_apr          DOUBLE COMMENT '历史连带率',
  old_roi          DOUBLE COMMENT '历史回报率'
) COMMENT '智能发券前历史记录表' 
PARTITIONED BY(ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_old PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  coalesce(trd.tenantId, dish.tenantId)                                                   AS tenantId,
  coalesce(trd.service_order_id, dish.service_order_id)                                   AS service_order_id,
  coalesce(trd.avg_tc, 0)                                                                 AS old_avg_tc,
  coalesce(trd.pct, 0)                                                                    AS old_pct,
  coalesce(coalesce(dish.sales, 0) / coalesce(trd.tc, 0), 0)                              AS old_apr,
  coalesce(coalesce(trd.gmv, 0) / (coalesce(trd.order_gmv, 0) - coalesce(trd.gmv, 0)), 0) AS old_roi
FROM
  (SELECT
     tenantId,
     service_order_id,
     gmv,
     coupon_gmv,
     tc,
     avg_tc,
     pct,
     order_gmv
   FROM dws_coupon_trd_stat_old_nouse
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') trd
  FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                     tenantId,
                     service_order_id,
                     sales
                   FROM dws_coupon_dish_stat_old_nouse
                   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') dish
    ON trd.tenantId = dish.tenantId AND trd.service_order_id = dish.service_order_id;


-- ###############    ############### --


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_new(
  tenantId         STRING COMMENT '租户ID',
  service_order_id STRING COMMENT '发券活动ID',
  gmv              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内总营业额',
  coupon_gmv       DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内核券营业额',
  avg_tc           DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内平均交易数',
  pct              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内客单价',
  apr              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内连带率',
  coupon_dist      BIGINT COMMENT '总发券量',
  coupon_acpt      BIGINT COMMENT '券总领取量',
  coupon_used      BIGINT COMMENT '核销量',
  roi              DOUBLE COMMENT '服务期内回报率'
) COMMENT '智能发券周期内记录表' 
PARTITIONED BY(ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_new PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  coalesce(trd.tenantId, dish.tenantId, send.tenantId)                           AS tenantId,
  coalesce(trd.service_order_id, dish.service_order_id, send.service_order_id)   AS service_order_id,
  coalesce(trd.gmv, 0)                                                           AS gmv,
  coalesce(trd.coupon_gmv, 0)                                                    AS coupon_gmv,
  coalesce(trd.tc, 0) / coalesce(trd.period + 7, 0)                              AS avg_tc,
  coalesce(trd.pct, 0)                                                           AS pct,
  coalesce(coalesce(dish.sales, 0) / coalesce(trd.tc, 0), 0)                     AS apr,
  coalesce(send.coupon_dist, 0)                                                  AS coupon_dist,
  coalesce(send.coupon_acpt, 0)                                                  AS coupon_acpt,
  coalesce(trd.coupon_used, 0)                                                   AS coupon_used,
  coalesce(coalesce(trd.coupon_gmv, 0) / coalesce(trd.total_coupon_count, 0), 0) AS roi
FROM
  (SELECT
     coalesce(nouse.tenantId, used.tenantId)                                      AS tenantId,
     coalesce(nouse.service_order_id, used.service_order_id)                      AS service_order_id,
     coalesce(nouse.gmv, 0) + coalesce(used.gmv, 0)                               AS gmv,
     coalesce(nouse.coupon_gmv, 0) + coalesce(used.coupon_gmv, 0)                 AS coupon_gmv,
     coalesce(nouse.tc, 0) + coalesce(used.tc, 0)                                 AS tc,
     coalesce(
         (coalesce(nouse.gmv, 0) + coalesce(used.gmv, 0)) /
         (coalesce(nouse.tc, 0) + coalesce(used.tc, 0)),
         0)
                                                                                  AS pct,
     coalesce(nouse.trade_user_count, 0) + coalesce(used.trade_user_count, 0)     AS trade_user_count,
     coalesce(nouse.coupon_used, 0) + coalesce(used.coupon_used, 0)               AS coupon_used,
     coalesce(nouse.total_coupon_count, 0) + coalesce(used.total_coupon_count, 0) AS total_coupon_count,
     coalesce(nouse.order_gmv, 0) + coalesce(used.order_gmv, 0)                   AS order_gmv,
     coalesce(nouse.period, used.period)                                          AS period 
   FROM (SELECT
           tenantId,
           service_order_id,
           gmv,
           coupon_gmv,
           tc,
           pct,
           trade_user_count,
           coupon_used,
           total_coupon_count,
           order_gmv,
           period
         FROM dws_coupon_trd_stat_new_nouse
         WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') nouse FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                                                                      tenantId,
                                                                      service_order_id,
                                                                      gmv,
                                                                      coupon_gmv,
                                                                      tc,
                                                                      pct,
                                                                      trade_user_count,
                                                                      coupon_used,
                                                                      total_coupon_count,
                                                                      order_gmv,
                                                                      period
                                                                    FROM dws_coupon_trd_stat_new_use
                                                                    WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') used
       ON nouse.tenantId = used.tenantId AND nouse.service_order_id = used.service_order_id) trd
  FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                     coalesce(nouse.tenantId, used.tenantId)                 AS tenantId,
                     coalesce(nouse.service_order_id, used.service_order_id) AS service_order_id,
                     coalesce(nouse.sales, 0) + coalesce(used.sales, 0)      AS sales
                   FROM (SELECT
                           tenantId,
                           service_order_id,
                           sales
                         FROM dws_coupon_dish_stat_new_nouse
                         WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') nouse FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                                                                                      tenantId,
                                                                                      service_order_id,
                                                                                      sales
                                                                                    FROM dws_coupon_dish_stat_new_use
                                                                                    WHERE
                                                                                      ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}') used
                       ON nouse.tenantId = used.tenantId AND nouse.service_order_id = used.service_order_id) dish
    ON trd.tenantId = dish.tenantId AND trd.service_order_id = dish.service_order_id
  FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                     service_order_id,
                     tenantId,
                     sum(coupon_dist)   AS coupon_dist,
                     sum(coupon_acpt)   AS coupon_acpt 
                   FROM dws_coupon_send_1d
                   WHERE ds <= '${bdp.system.bizdate}' GROUP BY tenantId,service_order_id) send
    ON trd.tenantId = send.tenantId AND trd.service_order_id = send.service_order_id;

set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_coupon_statistic PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  concat(old.tenantId, '0000', old.service_order_id, '000') AS id,
  old.tenantId,
  old.service_order_id,
  new.gmv,
  new.coupon_gmv,
  new.avg_tc,
  old.old_avg_tc,
  new.pct,
  old.old_pct,
  new.apr,
  old.old_apr,
  new.coupon_dist,
  new.coupon_acpt,
  new.coupon_used,
  new.roi,
  old.old_roi,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}'                                             AS gmt_created,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}'                                             AS gmt_modified
FROM ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_old old INNER JOIN ads_nrs_bd_coupon_stat_new new
    ON old.tenantId = new.tenantId AND old.service_order_id = new.service_order_id AND new.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
WHERE old.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}';

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS ads_nrs_coupon_daily_sales_trend (
  id                 STRING COMMENT '主键ID',
  tenantId           STRING COMMENT '租户ID',
  trend_date         STRING COMMENT '日期天',
  gmv                DOUBLE COMMENT '每日总营业额',
  coupon_gmv         DOUBLE COMMENT '每日核券营业额,让利所获营业额',
  tc                 BIGINT COMMENT '每日交易数',
  pct                DOUBLE COMMENT '每日客单价',
  apr                DOUBLE COMMENT '每日连带率',
  coupon_apr         DOUBLE COMMENT '核销每日连带率',
  sales              BIGINT COMMENT '每日售出商品总数',
  trade_user_count   BIGINT COMMENT '日交易总人数',
  coupon_dist        BIGINT COMMENT '总日发券量',
  coupon_acpt        BIGINT COMMENT '券日领取量',
  coupon_used        BIGINT COMMENT '日核销量',
  roi                DOUBLE COMMENT '每日回报率',
  total_coupon_count DOUBLE COMMENT '每日让利成本',
  order_gmv          DOUBLE COMMENT '每日订单总额',
  gmt_created        STRING COMMENT '插入时间',
  gmt_modified       STRING COMMENT '更新时间'
) COMMENT '每日智能发券报表'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_coupon_daily_sales_trend PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT 
concat(coalesce(trd.tenantId,dish.tenantId,send.tenantId),'${bdp.system.bizdate}') AS id, 
coalesce(trd.tenantId,dish.tenantId,send.tenantId)                            AS tenantId,
concat(substr(coalesce(trd.statDate,dish.statDate,send.statDate), 0, 4), 
  '-', substr(coalesce(trd.statDate,dish.statDate,send.statDate), 5, 2), 
  '-',substr(coalesce(trd.statDate,dish.statDate,send.statDate), 7, 2))       AS trend_date,
coalesce(trd.gmv, 0)                                                          AS gmv,
coalesce(trd.coupon_gmv, 0)                                                   AS coupon_gmv,
coalesce(trd.tc, 0)                                                           AS tc,
coalesce(trd.pct, 0)                                                          AS pct,
coalesce(coalesce(dish.sales,0) / coalesce(trd.tc, 0), 0)                     AS apr,
0                                                                             AS coupon_apr,
coalesce(dish.sales,0)                                                        AS sales,
coalesce(trd.trade_user_count,0)                                              AS trade_user_count,
coalesce(send.coupon_dist, 0)                                                 AS coupon_dist,
coalesce(send.coupon_acpt, 0)                                                 AS coupon_acpt,
coalesce(trd.coupon_used, 0)                                                  AS coupon_used,
coalesce(coalesce(trd.coupon_gmv,0) / coalesce(trd.total_coupon_count, 0), 0) AS roi,
coalesce(trd.total_coupon_count, 0)                                           AS total_coupon_count,
coalesce(trd.order_gmv, 0)                                                    AS order_gmv,
'${bdp.system.cyctime}'                                                       AS gmt_created,
'${bdp.system.cyctime}'                                                       AS gmt_modified
FROM
  (SELECT
     statDate,
     tenantId,
     sum(gmv)                        AS gmv,
     sum(coupon_gmv)                 AS coupon_gmv,
     sum(tc)                         AS tc,
     coalesce(sum(gmv) / sum(tc), 0) AS pct,
     sum(trade_user_count)           AS trade_user_count,
     sum(coupon_used)                AS coupon_used,
     sum(total_coupon_count)         AS total_coupon_count,
     sum(order_gmv)                  AS order_gmv
   FROM dws_coupon_trd_1d
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' GROUP BY tenantId, statDate) trd
  FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                     statDate,
                     tenantId,
                     sum(sales)              AS sales
                   FROM dws_coupon_dish_1d
                   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' GROUP BY tenantId,statDate) dish
    ON trd.tenantId = dish.tenantId AND trd.statDate = dish.statDate
  FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                     statDate,
                     tenantId,
                     sum(coupon_dist)   AS coupon_dist,
                     sum(coupon_acpt)   AS coupon_acpt 
                   FROM dws_coupon_send_1d
                   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' GROUP BY tenantId,statDate) send
    ON trd.tenantId = send.tenantId AND trd.statDate = send.statDate;

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS ads_nrs_coupon_daily_sales_trend_ser (

  service_order_id   STRING COMMENT '发券活动ID',
  trend_date         STRING COMMENT '日期天',
  gmv                DOUBLE COMMENT '每日总营业额',
  coupon_gmv         DOUBLE COMMENT '每日核券营业额,让利所获营业额',
  tc                 BIGINT COMMENT '每日交易数',
  pct                DOUBLE COMMENT '每日客单价',
  apr                DOUBLE COMMENT '每日连带率',
  coupon_apr         DOUBLE COMMENT '核销每日连带率',
  sales              BIGINT COMMENT '每日售出商品总数',
  trade_user_count   BIGINT COMMENT '日交易总人数',
  coupon_dist        BIGINT COMMENT '总日发券量',
  coupon_acpt        BIGINT COMMENT '券日领取量',
  coupon_used        BIGINT COMMENT '日核销量',
  roi                DOUBLE COMMENT '每日回报率',
  total_coupon_count DOUBLE COMMENT '每日让利成本',
  order_gmv          DOUBLE COMMENT '每日订单总额',
  gmt_created        STRING COMMENT '插入时间',
  gmt_modified       STRING COMMENT '更新时间'
) COMMENT '每日智能发券报表带发券活动ID'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_coupon_daily_sales_trend_ser PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT 
coalesce(trd.tenantId,dish.tenantId,send.tenantId)                            AS tenantId,
coalesce(send.service_order_id,trd.service_order_id,dish.service_order_id)    AS service_order_id,
concat(substr(coalesce(trd.statDate,dish.statDate,send.statDate), 0, 4), 
  '-', substr(coalesce(trd.statDate,dish.statDate,send.statDate), 5, 2), 
  '-',substr(coalesce(trd.statDate,dish.statDate,send.statDate), 7, 2))       AS trend_date,
coalesce(trd.gmv, 0)                                                          AS gmv,
coalesce(trd.coupon_gmv, 0)                                                   AS coupon_gmv,
coalesce(trd.tc, 0)                                                           AS tc,
coalesce(trd.pct, 0)                                                          AS pct,
coalesce(coalesce(dish.sales,0) / coalesce(trd.tc, 0), 0)                     AS apr,
0                                                                             AS coupon_apr,
coalesce(dish.sales,0)                                                        AS sales,
coalesce(trd.trade_user_count,0)                                              AS trade_user_count,
coalesce(send.coupon_dist, 0)                                                 AS coupon_dist,
coalesce(send.coupon_acpt, 0)                                                 AS coupon_acpt,
coalesce(trd.coupon_used, 0)                                                  AS coupon_used,
coalesce(coalesce(trd.coupon_gmv,0) / coalesce(trd.total_coupon_count, 0), 0) AS roi,
coalesce(trd.total_coupon_count, 0)                                           AS total_coupon_count,
coalesce(trd.order_gmv, 0)                                                    AS order_gmv,
'${bdp.system.cyctime}'                                                       AS gmt_created,
'${bdp.system.cyctime}'                                                       AS gmt_modified
FROM
  (SELECT
     statDate,
     tenantId,
     min(service_order_id)           AS service_order_id,
     sum(gmv)                        AS gmv,
     sum(coupon_gmv)                 AS coupon_gmv,
     sum(tc)                         AS tc,
     coalesce(sum(gmv) / sum(tc), 0) AS pct,
     sum(trade_user_count)           AS trade_user_count,
     sum(coupon_used)                AS coupon_used,
     sum(total_coupon_count)         AS total_coupon_count,
     sum(order_gmv)                  AS order_gmv
   FROM dws_coupon_trd_1d
   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' GROUP BY tenantId, statDate) trd
  FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                     statDate,
                     tenantId,
                     min(service_order_id)   AS service_order_id,
                     sum(sales)              AS sales
                   FROM dws_coupon_dish_1d
                   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' GROUP BY tenantId,statDate) dish
    ON trd.tenantId = dish.tenantId AND trd.statDate = dish.statDate
  FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                     statDate,
                     tenantId,
                     service_order_id,
                     coupon_dist   AS coupon_dist,
                     coupon_acpt   AS coupon_acpt 
                   FROM dws_coupon_send_1d
                   WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AND isnotnull(service_order_id)) send
    ON trd.tenantId = send.tenantId AND trd.statDate = send.statDate;

batchTask.name: job_dws_ope_trd_pay_tenant_1d
batchTask.sqlText:
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dws_ope_trd_pay_tenant_1d(
statDate                        STRING      COMMENT '统计日期' 
,tenantId                       STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,guest_cnt_1d                   BIGINT      COMMENT '日散客数'
,act_member_gmv_1d              DOUBLE      COMMENT '日激活会员交易额'
,unact_member_gmv_1d            DOUBLE      COMMENT '日未激活会员交易额'
,guest_gmv_1d                   DOUBLE      COMMENT '日散客交易额'
,act_member_tc_1d               BIGINT      COMMENT '日激活会员交易次数'
,unact_member_tc_1d             BIGINT      COMMENT '日未激活会员交易次数'
) COMMENT '最近一天租户粒度销售汇总表'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;

set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;
set hive.exec.dynamic.partition.mode=nonstrict;

-- comment (0-散客，1-未激活，2-激活)
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_ope_trd_pay_tenant_1d PARTITION (ds)
SELECT
  '${bdp.system.bizdate}'                          AS statDate,
  total.tenantId,
  coalesce(sum(CASE total.isIndividual
               WHEN 0
                 THEN 1 END), 0)                   AS guest_cnt_1d,
  coalesce(sum(CASE total.isIndividual
               WHEN 2
                 THEN total.custActualPay END), 0) AS act_member_gmv_1d,
  coalesce(sum(CASE total.isIndividual
               WHEN 1
                 THEN total.custActualPay END), 0) AS unact_member_gmv_1d,
  coalesce(sum(CASE total.isIndividual
               WHEN 0
                 THEN total.custActualPay END), 0) AS guest_gmv_1d,
  coalesce(sum(CASE total.isIndividual
               WHEN 2
                 THEN 1 END), 0)                   AS act_member_tc,
  coalesce(sum(CASE total.isIndividual
               WHEN 1
                 THEN 1 END), 0)                   AS unact_member_tc,
  total.paymentTime                                AS ds
FROM
  (SELECT
     o.tenantId,
     if(isnull(o.customerId), 0,
        if(isnull(o.memberId), 1, 2))       AS isIndividual,    -- (0-散客，1-未激活，2-激活)
     o.shopActualAmount                     AS shopActualAmount,
     date_format(o.paymentTime, 'yyyyMMdd') AS paymentTime,
     o.custActualPay
   FROM dwd_ord_trd_d o
   WHERE o.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AND o.tradeStatus = 4) total
GROUP BY total.tenantId, total.paymentTime;

batchTask.name: job_ads_nrs_mp_overview
batchTask.sqlText:
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS ads_nrs_mp_overview (
id                      STRING      COMMENT '主键ID'
,tenantId               STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,act_member_cnt         BIGINT      COMMENT '激活会员数'
,unact_member_cnt       BIGINT      COMMENT '未激活会员数'
,guest_cnt              BIGINT      COMMENT '散客数'
,incr_member_cnt_today  BIGINT      COMMENT '当日新增会员数'
,act_member_gmv         DOUBLE      COMMENT '激活会员交易额'
,unact_member_gmv       DOUBLE      COMMENT '未激活会员交易额'
,guest_gmv              DOUBLE      COMMENT '散客交易额'
,act_member_avg_tc      DOUBLE      COMMENT '激活会员平均交易次数'
,unact_member_avg_tc    DOUBLE      COMMENT '未激活会员平均交易次数'
,act_member_pct         DOUBLE      COMMENT '激活会员平均客单价'
,unact_member_pct       DOUBLE      COMMENT '未激活会员平均客单价'
,gmt_created            STRING      COMMENT '创建时间'
,gmt_modified           STRING      COMMENT '修改时间'
) COMMENT '会员洞察纵览表'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_mp_overview PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  t.id                                                                               AS id,
  t.id                                                                               AS tenantId,
  coalesce(tm.act_member_cnt, 0)                                                     AS act_member_cnt,
  coalesce(tm.unact_member_cnt, 0)                                                   AS unact_member_cnt,
  coalesce(pts.guest_cnt_std, 0)                                                     AS guest_cnt,
  coalesce(tm.incr_member_cnt_today, 0)                                              AS incr_member_cnt_today,
  coalesce(pts.act_member_gmv_std, 0)                                                AS act_member_gmv,
  coalesce(pts.unact_member_gmv_std,0)                                               AS unact_member_gmv,
  coalesce(pts.guest_gmv_std,0)                                                      AS guest_gmv,
  if(isnull(tm.act_member_cnt) OR tm.act_member_cnt = 0, 0, pts.act_member_tc_std /
                                                            tm.act_member_cnt)       AS act_member_avg_tc,
  if(isnull(tm.unact_member_cnt) OR tm.unact_member_cnt = 0, 0, pts.unact_member_tc_std /
                                                                tm.unact_member_cnt) AS unact_member_avg_tc,
  coalesce(if(pts.act_member_tc_std = 0, 0, pts.act_member_gmv_std /
                                   pts.act_member_tc_std),0)                         AS act_member_pct,
  coalesce(if(pts.unact_member_tc_std = 0, 0, pts.unact_member_gmv_std /
                                     pts.unact_member_tc_std),0)                     AS unact_member_pct,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}'                                                            AS gmt_created,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}'                                                            AS gmt_modified
FROM ods_nrs_tenant t
  LEFT OUTER JOIN dws_ope_trd_pay_tenant_std pts ON t.id = pts.tenantId AND pts.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
  LEFT OUTER JOIN dws_ope_tenant_member tm ON t.id = tm.tenantId AND tm.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
WHERE t.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}';

batchTask.name: job_dws_ope_ma_trade_trend_1d
batchTask.sqlText:
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dws_ope_ma_trade_trend_1d(
statDate                     STRING COMMENT '统计日期'
,day_id                      STRING COMMENT '天ID'
,week_id                     STRING COMMENT '周ID'
,month_id                    STRING COMMENT '月ID'
,quarter_id                  STRING COMMENT '季度ID'
,year_id                     STRING COMMENT '年度ID'
,tenantId                    STRING COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId                      STRING COMMENT '门店ID'
,gmv                         DOUBLE COMMENT '交易总额'
,tc                          BIGINT COMMENT '交易笔数'
,pct                         DOUBLE COMMENT '客单价'
) COMMENT '门店交易日趋势1天'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING ) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 1000;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;
set hive.exec.dynamic.partition.mode=nonstrict;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_ope_ma_trade_trend_1d PARTITION (ds)
SELECT
'${bdp.system.bizdate}' AS statDate,
time.day_id             AS day_id,
time.week_id            AS week_id,
time.month_id           AS month_id,
time.quarter_id         AS quarter_id,
time.year_id            AS year_id,
res.tenantId,
res.shopId,
res.gmv,
res.tc,
res.pct,
res.paymentTime         AS ds 
FROM 
(SELECT
  tenantId,
  shopId,
  date_format(paymentTime,'yyyyMMdd') AS paymentTime,
  sum(shopActualAmount)               AS gmv, -- 交易额 
  count(DISTINCT orderId)             AS tc,  -- 交易笔数 
  avg(shopActualAmount)               AS pct  -- 客单价 
FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
WHERE
  tradeStatus = 4 AND ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' 
GROUP BY tenantId, shopId, date_format(paymentTime,'yyyyMMdd')
UNION 
SELECT
  tenantId,
  '0'                                 AS shopId,
  date_format(paymentTime,'yyyyMMdd') AS paymentTime,
  sum(shopActualAmount)               AS gmv, -- 交易额 
  count(DISTINCT orderId)             AS tc,  -- 交易笔数 
  avg(shopActualAmount)               AS pct  -- 客单价 
FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
WHERE
  tradeStatus = 4 AND ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
GROUP BY tenantId, date_format(paymentTime,'yyyyMMdd')) res 
 LEFT OUTER JOIN dim_unit_day time ON res.paymentTime = time.day_id AND time.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}';

-------  自然周 --------
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dws_ope_ma_trade_trend_cw(
statDate                     STRING COMMENT '统计日期'
,tenantId                    STRING COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId                      STRING COMMENT '门店ID'
,week_id                     STRING COMMENT '周ID'
,gmv                         DOUBLE COMMENT '交易总额'
,tc                          BIGINT COMMENT '交易笔数'
,pct                         DOUBLE COMMENT '客单价'
) COMMENT '门店交易日趋势自然周'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING ) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_ope_ma_trade_trend_cw PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  '${bdp.system.bizdate}'              AS statDate,
  tenantId,
  shopId,
  week_id,
  sum(gmv)                             AS gmv, -- 交易额 
  sum(tc)                              AS tc,  -- 交易笔数 
  coalesce(sum(gmv) / sum(tc),0)       AS pct  -- 客单价
FROM dws_ope_ma_trade_trend_1d
WHERE
  ds <= '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
GROUP BY tenantId, shopId, week_id;

batchTask.name: job_dws_ope_ma_order_channel_trend_1d
batchTask.sqlText:
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS  dws_ope_ma_order_channel_trend_1d(
statDate             STRING      COMMENT '统计日期'
,day_id              STRING      COMMENT '天ID'
,week_id             STRING      COMMENT '周ID'
,month_id            STRING      COMMENT '月ID'
,quarter_id          STRING      COMMENT '季度ID'
,year_id             STRING      COMMENT '年度ID'
,tenantId            STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId              STRING      COMMENT '门店ID'
,channel_dim         BIGINT      COMMENT '订单渠道'
,gmv                 DOUBLE      COMMENT '交易总额'
,privilege_gmv       DOUBLE      COMMENT '优惠总额'
,order_gmv           DOUBLE      COMMENT '订单总额'
,roi                 DOUBLE      COMMENT 'roi'
) COMMENT '门店订单渠道趋势分析1天'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING ) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;
set hive.exec.dynamic.partition.mode=nonstrict;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_ope_ma_order_channel_trend_1d PARTITION (ds)
SELECT
  '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AS statDate,
  time.day_id             AS day_id,
  time.week_id            AS week_id,
  time.month_id           AS month_id,
  time.quarter_id         AS quarter_id,
  time.year_id            AS year_id,
  res.tenantId            AS tenantId,
  res.shopId              AS shopId,
  res.dimId               AS channel_dim,
  res.gmv                 AS gmv,
  res.privilege_gmv       AS privilege_gmv,
  res.order_gmv           AS order_gmv,
  res.roi                 AS roi,
  res.paymentTime         AS ds
FROM (
       SELECT
         d.tenantId                                                         AS tenantId,
         d.shopId                                                           AS shopId,
         d.paymentTime                                                      AS paymentTime,
         d.dimId                                                            AS dimId,
         sum(d.shopActualAmount)                                            AS gmv,
         sum(d.custActualPay - d.shopActualAmount)                          AS privilege_gmv,
         sum(d.tradeAmount)                                                 AS order_gmv, -- 订单原价
         coalesce(sum(d.shopActualAmount) / sum(d.tradeAmount - d.shopActualAmount),0)  AS roi        -- ROI：商家实收/(订单原价-商家实收)
       FROM
         (
           SELECT
             tenantId,
             shopId,
             date_format(paymentTime,'yyyyMMdd') AS paymentTime,
             shopActualAmount,
             custActualPay,
             tradeAmount,
             (CASE
              WHEN sourceChild IN (1, 2, 3, 141, 142)
                THEN 31
              WHEN sourceChild IN (31, 32, 33)
                THEN 32
              WHEN sourceChild = 161
                THEN 33
              WHEN sourceChild = 181
                THEN 34
              ELSE 35
              END) AS dimId
           FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
           WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AND tradeStatus = 4) d
       GROUP BY d.tenantId, d.shopId, d.dimId, d.paymentTime
       UNION
       SELECT
         dd.tenantId,
         '0'                                                                   AS shopId,
         dd.paymentTime                                                        AS paymentTime,
         dd.dimId,
         sum(dd.shopActualAmount)                                              AS gmv,
         sum(dd.custActualPay - dd.shopActualAmount)                           AS privilege_gmv,
         sum(dd.tradeAmount)                                                   AS order_gmv, -- 订单原价
         coalesce(sum(dd.shopActualAmount) / sum(dd.tradeAmount - dd.shopActualAmount),0)  AS roi        -- ROI：商家实收/(订单原价-商家实收)
       FROM
         (
           SELECT
             tenantId,
             date_format(paymentTime,'yyyyMMdd') AS paymentTime,
             shopActualAmount,
             custActualPay,
             tradeAmount,
             (CASE
              WHEN sourceChild IN (1, 2, 3, 141, 142)
                THEN 31
              WHEN sourceChild IN (31, 32, 33)
                THEN 32
              WHEN sourceChild = 161
                THEN 33
              WHEN sourceChild = 181
                THEN 34
              ELSE 35
              END) AS dimId
           FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
           WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AND tradeStatus = 4) dd
       GROUP BY dd.tenantId, dd.dimId, dd.paymentTime) res
    LEFT OUTER JOIN dim_unit_day time ON res.paymentTime = time.day_id AND time.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}';

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS  dws_ope_ma_order_channel_trend_cw(
statDate             STRING      COMMENT '统计日期'
,tenantId            STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId              STRING      COMMENT '门店ID'
,week_id             STRING      COMMENT '周ID'
,channel_dim         BIGINT      COMMENT '订单渠道'
,gmv                 DOUBLE      COMMENT '交易总额'
,privilege_gmv       DOUBLE      COMMENT '优惠总额'
,order_gmv           DOUBLE      COMMENT '订单总额'
,roi                 DOUBLE      COMMENT 'roi'
) COMMENT '门店订单渠道趋势分析自然周'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING ) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_ope_ma_order_channel_trend_cw PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  '${bdp.system.bizdate}'                           AS statDate,
  tenantId,
  shopId,
  week_id,
  channel_dim,
  sum(gmv)                                          AS gmv,            -- 交易额 
  sum(privilege_gmv)                                AS privilege_gmv,  -- 优惠金额 
  sum(order_gmv)                                    AS order_gmv,      -- 订单金额
  coalesce(sum(gmv) / sum(order_gmv - gmv),0)       AS roi             -- 客单价
FROM dws_ope_ma_order_channel_trend_1d
WHERE
  ds <= '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
GROUP BY tenantId, shopId, channel_dim, week_id;

batchTask.name: job_dws_ope_ma_overview_1d
batchTask.sqlText:
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dws_ope_ma_overview_1d(
stat_date            STRING      COMMENT '统计日期'
,tenantId            STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId              STRING      COMMENT '门店ID'
,order_gmv           DOUBLE      COMMENT '当日订单总额'
,gmv                 DOUBLE      COMMENT '当日交易总额'
,privilege_gmv       DOUBLE      COMMENT '当日优惠总额'
,tc                  INT         COMMENT '当日交易笔数'
,gmt_created         STRING      COMMENT '创建时间'
,gmt_modified        STRING      COMMENT '修改时间'
) COMMENT '门店每日经营概况'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;

set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;
set hive.exec.dynamic.partition.mode=nonstrict;

INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_ope_ma_overview_1d PARTITION (ds)
SELECT
  '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AS statDate,
  res.tenantId,
  res.shopId,
  res.order_gmv,
  res.gmv,
  res.privilege_gmv,
  res.tc,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}' AS gmt_created,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}' AS gmt_modified,
  res.paymentTime         AS ds
FROM (SELECT
        tenantId,
        shopId,
        date_format(paymentTime, 'yyyyMMdd')  AS paymentTime,
        sum(custActualPay)                    AS order_gmv,
        sum(shopActualAmount)                 AS gmv,
        sum(custActualPay - shopActualAmount) AS privilege_gmv,
        count(DISTINCT orderId)               AS tc
      FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
      WHERE tradeStatus = 4 AND ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
      GROUP BY tenantId, shopId, date_format(paymentTime, 'yyyyMMdd')
      UNION
      SELECT
        tenantId,
        0,
        date_format(paymentTime, 'yyyyMMdd')  AS paymentTime,
        sum(custActualPay)                    AS order_gmv,
        sum(shopActualAmount)                 AS gmv,
        sum(custActualPay - shopActualAmount) AS privilege_gmv,
        count(DISTINCT orderId)               AS tc
      FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
      WHERE tradeStatus = 4 AND ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
      GROUP BY tenantId, date_format(paymentTime, 'yyyyMMdd')) res;

,customerId         STRING      COMMENT '顾客ID'

               substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 0, 4), '-', substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 5, 2), '-',

  sum(tot_days_1d)                                        AS tot_days_7d
FROM dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_1d
WHERE ds BETWEEN '${key_7d}' AND '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
GROUP BY tenantId, customerId;
