INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_std PARTITION(ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  date_add(concat(
               substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 0, 4), '-', substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 5, 2), '-',
               substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 7, 2)), 1) AS statDate,
  tenantId,
  min(shopId)                                             AS shopId,
  customerId,
  datediff(date_add(concat(substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 0, 4), '-', substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 5, 2), '-',
                           substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 7, 2)), 1),
           max(max_payment_time))                         AS inter_days_std,
  sum(pay_quantity_1d)                                    AS pay_quantity_std,
  sum(pay_amount_1d)                                      AS pay_amount_std,

INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_std PARTITION(ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  date_add(concat(
               substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 0, 4), '-', substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 5, 2), '-',
               substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 7, 2)), 1) AS statDate,
  tenantId,
  min(shopId)                                             AS shopId,
  customerId,
  datediff(date_add(concat(substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 0, 4), '-', substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 5, 2), '-',
                           substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 7, 2)), 1),
           max(max_payment_time))                         AS inter_days_std,
  sum(pay_quantity_1d)                                    AS pay_quantity_std,
  sum(pay_amount_1d)                                      AS pay_amount_std,
  sum(tot_days_1d)                                        AS tot_days_std
FROM dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_1d
WHERE ds <= '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
GROUP BY tenantId, customerId;

batchTask.name: job_dws_alg_1d
batchTask.sqlText:
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_1d(
statDate            STRING      COMMENT '统计日期'
,tenantId           STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId             STRING      COMMENT '门店ID'
,customerId         STRING      COMMENT '顾客ID'
,max_payment_time   STRING      COMMENT '最近一天最晚支付时间'
,inter_days_1d      BIGINT      COMMENT '最近一天顾客最后一次发生支付行为距离当前日期多少天'
,pay_quantity_1d    BIGINT      COMMENT '最近一天顾客支付行为次数'
,pay_amount_1d      DOUBLE      COMMENT '最近一天顾客支付总金额'
,tot_days_1d        BIGINT      COMMENT '最近一天顾客出现支付行为的天数之和'
) COMMENT '最近1天算法信息指标'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING ) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;

set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;
set hive.exec.dynamic.partition.mode=nonstrict;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_1d PARTITION(ds)
SELECT
  date_add(concat(substr(t.par, 0, 4), '-', substr(t.par, 5, 2), '-', substr(t.par, 7, 2)),1)        AS statDate,
  t.tenantId              AS tenantId,
  t.shopId                AS shopId,
  t.customerId            AS customerId,
  t.paymentTime           AS max_payment_time,
  datediff(date_add(concat(substr(t.par, 0, 4), '-', substr(t.par, 5, 2), '-', substr(t.par, 7, 2)),1),
           t.paymentTime) AS inter_days_1d,
  t.pay_quantity_1d       AS pay_quantity_1d,
  t.pay_amount_1d         AS pay_amount_1d,
  t.tot_days_1d           AS tot_days_1d,
  t.par                   AS ds
FROM (
       SELECT
         tenantId,
         min(shopId)                                                              AS shopId,
         customerId,
         max(paymentTime)                                                         AS paymentTime,
         COUNT(1)                                                                 AS pay_quantity_1d,
         sum(custActualPay)                                                       AS pay_amount_1d,
         size(collect_set(substr(regexp_replace(paymentTime, '-', ''), 1, 8)))    AS tot_days_1d,
         date_format(paymentTime, 'yyyyMMdd')                                     AS par
       FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
       WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AND tradePayStatus = 3 AND isnotnull(customerId)
       GROUP BY tenantId, customerId, date_format(paymentTime, 'yyyyMMdd')) t;

CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS dws_alg_cust_label(
statDate                STRING      COMMENT '统计日期'
,tenantId               STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId                 STRING      COMMENT '门店ID'
,customerId             STRING      COMMENT '顾客ID'
,label                  BIGINT      COMMENT '顾客未来七天内是否消费：1-是，0-否 (距离今日不足七天算最近区间)'
) COMMENT '当日顾客未来七天内是否消费标记'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING ) STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;

-------- 前一天 ----------
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE dws_alg_cust_label PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  date_add(concat(substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 0, 4), '-', substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 5, 2), '-', substr('${bdp.system.bizdate}', 7, 2)),1)        AS statDate,
  d.tenantId,
  d.shopId,
  d.customerId,
  if(d.cnt > 0, 1, 0)            AS lable
FROM(
SELECT
  tenantId,
  min(shopId)                    AS shopId,
  customerId,
  count(1)                       AS cnt
FROM dws_alg_trd_pay_cust_1d
WHERE (ds BETWEEN '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AND '${key_f5d}') AND isnotnull(customerId)

batchTask.name: job_ads_nrs_mp_consume_freq
batchTask.sqlText:
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS ads_nrs_mp_consume_freq (
id                      STRING      COMMENT '主键ID'
,tenantId               STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,freq                   BIGINT      COMMENT '消费次数'
,days                   DOUBLE      COMMENT '达成该消费频次的平均天数'
,gmt_created            STRING      COMMENT '创建时间'
,gmt_modified           STRING      COMMENT '修改时间'
) COMMENT '会员消费频次表'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;

set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;

INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_mp_consume_freq PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  concat(res.tenantId, res.rank)  AS id,
  res.tenantId                    AS tenantId,
  res.rank                        AS freq,
  avg(res.interDays)              AS days,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}'         AS gmt_created,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}'         AS gmt_modified
FROM (
       SELECT
         total.tenantId,
         total.memberId,
         datediff(to_date(total.paymentTime), to_date(total.upgradeTime)) AS interDays,
         total.rank
       FROM (
              SELECT
                o.tenantId,
                o.memberId,
                o.paymentTime,
                first(cust.upgradeTime) AS upgradeTime,
                row_number()               over (partition BY o.tenantId, o.memberId ORDER BY o.paymentTime) rank
              FROM dwd_ord_trd_d o
                JOIN dim_cust_info cust
                  ON o.tenantId = cust.tenantId AND o.customerId = cust.id AND cust.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
              WHERE isnotnull(o.memberId) AND isnotnull(cust.upgradeTime) AND o.paymentTime >= cust.upgradeTime AND o.ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
              GROUP BY o.tenantId, o.memberId, o.paymentTime) total
       WHERE total.rank <= 11) res
GROUP BY res.tenantId, res.rank;

batchTask.name: job_ads_nrs_ma_ord_source_stat
batchTask.sqlText:
CREATE TABLE if NOT EXISTS ads_nrs_ma_ord_source_stat(
id                      STRING      COMMENT ''
,tenantId               STRING      COMMENT '租户ID'
,shopId                 STRING      COMMENT '门店ID'
,stat_date              STRING      COMMENT '日期'
,dimId                  STRING      COMMENT '维表ID'
,cnt                    BIGINT      COMMENT '订单渠道来源数量'
,percentVal             DOUBLE      COMMENT '订单渠道来源比例'
,gmt_created            STRING      COMMENT '创建时间'
,gmt_modified           STRING      COMMENT '修改时间'
) COMMENT '历史订单渠道来源占比'
PARTITIONED BY (ds STRING COMMENT '时间分区') STORED AS orc LIFECYCLE 365;


set spark.sql.shuffle.partitions=1;


INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE ads_nrs_ma_ord_source_stat PARTITION (ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}')
SELECT
  concat(stat.tenantId,stat.shopId,'${bdp.system.bizdate}',stat.dimId)  AS id,
  stat.tenantId,
  stat.shopId,
  concat(substr(${bdp.system.bizdate}, 0, 4), '-', substr(${bdp.system.bizdate}, 5, 2), '-',substr(${bdp.system.bizdate}, 7, 2)) AS stat_date,
  stat.dimId,
  stat.cnt,
  stat.pVal,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}' AS gmt_created,
  '${bdp.system.cyctime}' AS gmt_modified
FROM (
       SELECT
         res.tenantId,
         '0'                AS shopId,
         res.dimId,
         res.cnt            AS cnt,
         res.cnt / pd_1.cnt AS pVal
       FROM (
              SELECT
                pd.tenantId,
                pd.dimId,
                count(pd.dimId) AS cnt
              FROM (
                     SELECT
                       tenantId,
                       (CASE
                        WHEN sourceChild IN (1, 2, 3, 141, 142)
                          THEN 31
                        WHEN sourceChild IN (31, 32, 33)
                          THEN 32
                        WHEN sourceChild = 161
                          THEN 33
                        WHEN sourceChild = 181
                          THEN 34
                        ELSE 35
                        END) AS dimId
                     FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
                     WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AND tradeStatus = 4) pd
              GROUP BY pd.tenantId, pd.dimId) res LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                                                                     tenantId,
                                                                     count(sourceChild) AS cnt
                                                                   FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
                                                                   WHERE
                                                                     ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
                                                                     AND
                                                                     tradeStatus = 4
                                                                   GROUP BY tenantId) pd_1 ON res.tenantId = pd_1.tenantId
       UNION
       SELECT
         res.tenantId,
         res.shopId,
         res.dimId,
         res.cnt            AS cnt,
         res.cnt / pd_1.cnt AS pVal
       FROM (
              SELECT
                pd.tenantId,
                pd.shopId,
                pd.dimId,
                count(pd.dimId) AS cnt
              FROM (
                     SELECT
                       tenantId,
                       shopId,
                       (CASE
                        WHEN sourceChild IN (1, 2, 3, 141, 142)
                          THEN 31
                        WHEN sourceChild IN (31, 32, 33)
                          THEN 32
                        WHEN sourceChild = 161
                          THEN 33
                        WHEN sourceChild = 181
                          THEN 34
                        ELSE 35
                        END) AS dimId
                     FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
                     WHERE ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}' AND tradeStatus = 4) pd
              GROUP BY pd.tenantId, pd.shopId, pd.dimId) res LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT
                                                                                tenantId,
                                                                                shopId,
                                                                                count(sourceChild) AS cnt
                                                                              FROM dwd_ord_trd_d
                                                                              WHERE
                                                                                ds = '${bdp.system.bizdate}'
                                                                                AND
                                                                                tradeStatus = 4
                                                                              GROUP BY tenantId, shopId) pd_1
           ON res.tenantId = pd_1.tenantId AND res.shopId = pd_1.shopId) stat;
